column4: I tried to install ubuntu 6.10(x64), and first of all, after i pressed start ubuntu from the boot CD the loading screen was black/white.. and second after the loading, the monitor turned it self of..(no signal) I tried serval monitors and safe graphics mode.... I have a ATI x800 gfx. amd athlon64 3000+.. 1024mb ram..
i have that black&white too on amd64, they are working on it
